reviews.text: What a find this place is! It was so good I had to go twice in the week I stayed in the neighborhood.  The price is a reasonable and you can have a beer...
Square Slice Pizzeria is inside the North Arcade off of N High Street. It's a pop up kitchen so nothing fancy, you place your order and grab a beer or enjoy...

Incredible Pizza.

Located in the Old North Arcade is a new fantastic Detroit style pizza shop.

The pizzas are about an inch to two
Inches thick and loaded...
